sql: SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', id as 'easydb4id', nr, name FROM 'unib-heidelberg.public.dienststellen'
SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', id as 'easydb4id', personengruppe FROM 'unib-heidelberg.public.kumpersonen'
SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', id as 'easydb4id', situation FROM 'unib-heidelberg.public.kumsituationen'
SELECT id as '__source_unique_id', id as 'easydb4id', ort FROM 'unib-heidelberg.public.kumort'
